sb.model.tile.doormechanism

Class ButtonDoorGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • sb.model.tile.doormechanism.ButtonDoorGroup
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OrGroup, ParityGroup

    public abstract class ButtonDoorGroup
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a group of doors and the buttons that can open these

        protected abstract boolean isDoorOpenInternal(Door door)

      • isDoorOpen

        public boolean isDoorOpen(Door door)
        Checks if the door is open according to the internal ButtonDoorGroup rule. Throws an IllegalArgumentException if the door does not belong to this group.
        Parameters:
        door -
        Returns:
